title: Spinach, ricotta and onion quiche
ingredients: ['For the shortcrust pastry', '225g plain flour', '125g cold butter, cubed', '1 egg yolk (save the white for sealing the pastry case)', '30 to 40ml cold water', 'For the filling', 'olive oil', '5 to 6 spring onions, trimmed and halved lengthways', '1 to 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 bunches spinach, roughly chopped', '1/2 to 1 teaspoon dried mint (or fresh mint, chopped)', '300g ricotta cheese', '4 eggs', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
